transcription: Look into my eyes You will feel the same What you mean to me  Search your heart, search your soul You'll find me there, you'll search no more Don't tell me it's not worth dying for You can't tell me it's not worth dying for  And you're true Everything I do I do it for you Look into your eyes You will find There's nothing there to hide  Take me as I am, take my life. What a hero, I will tell the flies. Don't tell me it's not worth fighting for. You can tell me there's nothing I want more.  Oh  Oh  Search your heart Search your soul Search your heart Don't tell me there's another life I can't help it, there's nothing I want for  I'll never fight for you, fight, fight for you, I'll survive for you, I'll die for you. You know it's true, everything I do, I do for you.
